item.title: How to install ABAP 1909 on mac M1
item.description: How to run ABAP 1909 on MacOs with M1? For me, the best idea was to use UTM. I also tried before with docker without success - in the end, there was always an error. Install UTM Download Ubuntu Server x64 bit version Create virtual machine on UTM (220 GB storage, 6-7 CPU’s, additional flags) Install Ubuntu server on UTM Install docker sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install \ ca-certificates \ curl \ gnupg \ lsb-release curl -fsSL https://download.
